Rooms.Name: Entrance to Tower #1(Shops and Executive Offices)

Objects.Name: wedding ring
Objects.Description: A simple ring made out of gold, it looks like a ring one would recieve at a wedding from their spouse.

Objects.Name: sign
Objects.Description: A sign is posted in the ground

Objects.Name: yellow straightsword
Objects.Description: A @YYellow@n straightsword is lying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The long straight blade is stained a bright yellow.  It is well forged andthe hilt is made of gold.  On the hilt is a symbol that looks like the sun seemsto make the sword glow.  The blade is sharpened well and made of a sturdy metal.While somewhat heavy

Objects.Name: yellow field plate
Objects.Description: A @YYellow@n field plate is lying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The field plate is stained a bright yellow.  The armor is made of extremelysturdy metal and will sustain well against some pretty serious attacks.  Thearmor has a symbol that looks like a sun engraved on the back near the top.

Objects.Name: silver scimitar
Objects.Description: A @DSilver@n scimitar has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The scimitar is well curved and very sharp.  The blade is made of silver andshines like the full moon.  The hilt of the sword is also silver and veryexquisite.

Objects.Name: broiled turkey
Objects.Description: A Broiled Turkey has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This delicious meal was no doubt made by the chefs at The Turkey's Gobble.The famed food looks juicy and tender, cooked to a perfect golden brown on theoutside and a delicious white on the inside, it can make even the most stubbornperson's mouth water

Objects.Name: silver splint mail
Objects.Description: A @DSilver@n splint mail has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This unique armor has been made from forged scraps of silver, and issurprisingly durable.  The inside of the armor is covered in a layer of red feltfor comfort.  The silver seems to shine more than you would expect it to.

Objects.Name: turkey sandwich
Objects.Description: A Turkey Sandwich has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: A turkey sandwich with a toothpick.  It looks quite tasty.

Objects.Name: wooden cello
Objects.Description: A wooden cello has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The cello is pretty and made of wood.  It is in tune and can be used wellby masters.

Objects.Name: turkey soup
Objects.Description: A Turkey Soup has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The steaming soup is served in an ivory bowl.  The soup is a tanish colorwith bits of white turkey meat floating in it.  There are also vegetables suchas celery, tomatoes and carrots.

Objects.Name: turkey surprise
Objects.Description: A Turkey Surprise has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Nobody knows what they put in this meal.  Nobody really cares, since it isn'tthat great anyway.

Objects.Name: cranberry juice
Objects.Description: A Cranberry Juice has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The dark red juice is served in a tall glass with cranberries at the bottomof the juice.  The sweet and tart liquid is a favorite among many kids andadults.

Objects.Name: pumpkin ale
Objects.Description: A Pumpkin Ale has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The orange ale is served in a large glass mug.  It has a thick froth at thetop and is really bubbly.  On the side of the mug there is 'The Turkey's Gobble'written in calligraphy.

Objects.Name: pumpkin pie
Objects.Description: A Pumpkin Pie has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The pie is baked to perfection and is topped in the center with whip cream.It is steaming fresh from the oven and a dark orange-brown color.

Objects.Name: road heaven wine
Objects.Description: A @RRoad@n @Yto@n @CHeaven@n has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This dark red wine is called the @RRoad@n @Yto@n @CHeaven@n because it isextremely intoxicating but filling.  The bottle that contains it is huge andprobably will keep you busy for quite some time.  The wine has a smell of amixture of many fruits, though it is difficult to tell which ones were used.

Objects.Name: wine flask
Objects.Description: A Flask of White Wine has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The flask is brown, and not very big.  The wine inside it kind of smells likepeaches, for some reason.

Objects.Name: estanzia
Objects.Description: An Estanzia has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The wine in the bottle is a nice clear/white color.  The bottle itself isgreen and is wrapped with a large label that says 'Estanzia'.

Objects.Name: glass wine
Objects.Description: A glass of wine has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The glass is made of an intricately cut crystal filled to the top with asweet, red wine.  It tastes like a mixture of grape and raspberry that feelswarm on the tongue but cold in the hand.

Objects.Name: cellar key
Objects.Description: The wine cellar key has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The key is pink and cut very nicely.  It is hanging off of a chain and it has'Wine cellar' engraved on it.

Objects.Name: chalice red something
Objects.Description: A Chalice of Red Something has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: @WO@n@DM@n@WG@n @WO@n@DM@n@WG@n that isn't @mwine@n it's @rblood!!!!!  @n

Objects.Name: defender
Objects.Description: The @rD@n@me@n@rf@n@me@n@rn@n@md@n@re@n@mr@n has been left here.
Objects.ExtraFlags: Glow, Humming, NoDonate, MagicUser, Cleric, Thief, NoSell
Objects.ExtraDescription: The @rD@n@me@n@rf@n@me@n@rn@n@md@n@re@n@mr@n is a valiant sword only usableby masters of the world.  The blade is a dull gray and the hilt is made ofsilver with a leather bound handle for a good grip.  Legend goes it was used toprotect Los Torres from i nvasion of the Valdurain Army.  It is only wieldableby the warriors of the land.

Objects.Name: optical blue helm
Objects.Description: An @DOptical@n @bBlue@n helm has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Painted blue and black in a very, very thin striped pattern, the helmet makesyour eyes hurt a bit.  The helm completely covers your head and neck, and it'sdesgin makes it look like a hood.  There is a mask covering the face, witheyeholes and holes in front of the mouth and nose for breathing.  The emptyholes for the eyes seem to have a piercing look to them.

Objects.Name: large boots
Objects.Description: Some Large Boots have been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The boots are large and made of iron.  They are large enough to cover yourshins as well as your feet.

Objects.Name: titanium gauntlets
Objects.Description: Some Titanium Gauntlets have been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: These gauntlets have been forged with pure titanium.  They are sturdy yetflexible enough to fit your fingers well.  The metal feels unexpectedly warm asit is worn.  The knuckles of the gauntlets have small spikes on them foraesthetic purposes.

Objects.Name: pair greaves
Objects.Description: A pair of greaves have been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The greaves are made of metal and strap around the user's legs withleather-bound buckles.  They are very shiny and look brand new.

Objects.Name: white chainmail
Objects.Description: A White Chainmail has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: A chainmail made entirely of a white painted metal is here.  It has not beenpainted very well, for tiny hatches of gray are still visible.  The chainmailfeels somewhat heavy and it is longer than a normal chainmail would be.

Objects.Name: red wood bow
Objects.ShortDescription: a bow made of dark, red wood
Objects.Description: A bow made of dark, red wood has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This is a bow intricately made of red wood from the Red Forest outside of LosTorres.  It has a small jewel placed at the tip of the red wooden parabola.The coarse string of the bow is very stiff and difficult to pull for even thestrongest of people.  It makes a very quiet and constant 'twang' sound whenplucked.

Objects.Name: ousishi katana
Objects.Description: An Ousishi Katana has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This sword is a new model of the katana.  Unlike most models, it has abackward blade and is somewhat heavier.  There is a small hole in the bladeabove the hilt so the blade will make less sound when slashed.  It is also alittle longer and there is a little bit more curve to the end of the blade thana standard katana.

Objects.Name: red arrow
Objects.Description: A red arrow has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The skinny arrow is painted red and has red feathers at the end of it.  Itpierces the wind when fired and doesn't make more than a really quiet whistle.The head of the arrow is made of red painted iron.

Objects.Name: redwood quiver
Objects.Description: A Redwood Quiver has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Red painted wood signifies this quiver was made by the Red Assassins, aninfamous group from Los Torres.  It looks very deep and it might be able to holda lot of arrows.  There are metal bindings at the top and the bottom of thecylindrical quiver that keep the wood together.  They are fastened with screwsthat are welded into the iron.

Objects.Name: obscenity
Objects.Description: An @WO@n@Yb@n@Rs@n@Mc@n@Be@n@Cn@n@Gi@n@Kt@n@Wy@n has been left here.

Objects.Name: beam light
Objects.Description: A Beam of Light has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This is a strange source of light indeed.  It is a beam of eternal light fromthe sun enclosed within a clear and weightless magical case.  It floats withit's carrier and clears away any darkness it may see.

Objects.Name: kard
Objects.Description: A Kard has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The small and lightweight dagger was made so that nobody would see it when itis thrust at its opponent.  The blade reaches over the hilt by about an inch andis about 5 inches in length.

Objects.Name: red cloth costume
Objects.Description: A @RRed Cloth Costume@n has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The costume is made of red cloths woven and tied together in a tight fashion,with some flaps at the bottom.  It is apparently designed to be worn around thetorso, with tiny arm holes and an opening at the top and bottom.  The hems onthe clothing are gold colored and so are the buttons.  There are long, redstrings around the costume to fasten it to its wearer.

Objects.Name: pewter key
Objects.Description: A pewter key has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The key is simply cut, and made of a dark gray colored stone.

Objects.Name: bouquet exotic flowers
Objects.Description: A bouquet of exotic flowers has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: A hand picked bouquet of @rred@n, @ggreen@n, @yyellow@n and @bblue@n flowersnicely arranged into a bouquet could make the perfect gift for anyone.

Objects.Name: red breaker
Objects.Description: A Red Breaker has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This extremely large sword is also known as a 'breaker' It extends 4 feetmaking it extremely heavy but powerful.  The blade has been colored a shade ofred that matches the forest leaves.  The hilt is embedded with a symbol of ablazing meteor.

Objects.Name: broken chandelier
Objects.Description: A broken chandelier has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The chandelier is broken and of no use.  The top of the chandelier where thewiring would poke out has been cut off for some reason.

Objects.Name: marble fountain
Objects.Description: A Marble Fountain stands in the center of the plaza.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The fountain is made of a black marble and is impossibly cut, making theshape of a tree with hundreds of individual leaves!  What's more, every lastleaf is squirting out a pure water for drinking enjoyment.

Objects.Name: paintbrush
Objects.Description: A paintbrush has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The small paintbrush is dipped in blue paint.

Objects.Name: chef's knife
Objects.Description: A Chef's Knife has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The knife is a standard knife used in a kitchen.  It is very lare, and has asmall handle for holding.

Objects.Name: note
Objects.Description: A note has been left here.

Objects.Name: black belt
Objects.Description: A black belt has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This is a belt made of thick rough cloth that should be tied around thewaist.

Objects.Name: feather duster
Objects.Description: A Feather Duster has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The feather duster has a wooden handle attached to numerous large brownfeathers.  This seems ideal for cleaning places.

Objects.Name: spoilers list
Objects.ShortDescription: the Spoiler's List for Los Torres.
Objects.Description: The Spoiler's List of Los Torres is waiting to be read.
